name: PBR
description:
Game made for the Ludum Dare 41.

Mixing a simple 2D racing game with a puzzle game.

You've got to use colour keys to pass through doors of the same colour.

Enjoy and don't forget to rate our game.

We are 3 french guys. Luc already participated in 3 LD, Netarion already helped Luc in one LD and Lorenzo is a total beginner.
